Title: Tribes
Plot: After a young Muslim Marine is murdered near his Mosque, Ducky refuses to perform autopsy due to his religious beliefs, so the NCIS team tries to talk to the father of the deceased, and they send McGee to plant a bug in the Mosque, only to discover that the FBI already planted their bug.
GuestStars: Shaun Toub, Jonathan LaPaglia, Brian Dietzen, James Parks, David Haydn-Jones, Jennifer Hetrick
